What is the correct English translation of the following Chinese text: "调查的是这桩案件中贪污的人员。"
You think the correct translation is: The investigation is on the individuals involved in corruption in this case. Restate the translation and provide your reasons.

I believe the correct translation of the Chinese text "调查的是这桩案件中贪污的人员" is: "The investigation is on the personnel involved in corruption in this case."

I chose to use "personnel" instead of "individuals" because the term "personnel" specifically refers to a group of people working in an organization or a particular place, which fits the context of the individuals involved in corruption in this case. Additionally, "personnel" can imply a sense of organization or structure, which may be more appropriate in this legal context.

Therefore, "individuals" is a more suitable and accurate translation in this case.
